product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Tactical Field Trauma Kit
long_description: Designed to be small enough to carry with you on the trail, the Tactical Field Trauma Kit from Adventure Medical Kits includes supplies to treat minor injuries during backcountry adventure. Kit includes QuickClot(R) Sport Sponge to help slow bleeding. Includes antiseptic wipes, petroleum gauze and butterfly bandages to treat wounds, plus a variety of single-dose medications to treat pain, inflammation and common allergies. Biohazard disposal bag and examination gloves keep you protected while treating wounds in the field. Hospital-quality tools, inlcuding EMT shears and precision forceps aid backcountry care. An assortment of wraps and bandages provide support and help immobilize fractures. Adventure Medical Kits Tactical Field Trauma Kit measures 7 x 6 x 4.5 in. and is designed for 1-3-day backcountry trips with 1-4 people.
short_description: Designed to be small enough to carry with you on the trail, the Tactical Field Trauma Kit from Adventure Medical Kits includes supplies to treat minor injuries during backcountry adventure.
